text: welcome to spring in New York this is
Bill Cunningham and the parks the trees
the flower everything is just bursting
into bloom it's finally happened the
break from winter to real spring
although it may and we may could very
well have a frost it's April but it
doesn't matter this past week the
temperature was in the 80s low eighties
and people reacted in their style of
dress to the temperature and it was oh
well it was terrific I mean to come out
of down coats and all of that stuff and
bursting the daffodils were just at the
tip top peak it was absolutely terrific
Bryant Park absolutely flooded with
office workers coming out for a lunch in
82 degree sun one woman even pulled her
Chanel style tweed jacket over her head
as protection from the Sun and all I
could think was it wasn't a month ago
that the fountain in Bryant Park was a
cake of ice and here we are is they're
marvelous what nature does I mean just a
wonder the exuberance of people when you
have this total break from winter to
spring and of course in my world the
fashion world it's all about clothes the
men the women the way they put it
together it's not the pressured precious
and pressed look of the past but there
was even a woman in a new take on a
spring coat with white collar that's
part of the code but look at how fresh
and modern it is worn with sneakers and
this woman in her fabric it looked like
mattress ticking
bikers jacket with look at the sweater
it looks like a panel front sweater that
came over the skirt it was terrific and
of course the men continue their march
into uncharted territory which I just
crazy about I think it's big news so no
matter where the weather goes or
anything we have had the break from
winter and people react with in their
style of dress whether it's adding color
whether it's a removing their flip-flops
that came out immediately on Tuesday
when it was 82 degrees people everywhere
ground in flip-flops and then to go into
business they're putting on their heels
so I hope you enjoy this little slice of
New York happy spring
